title: [W]Case Details - Form
respondentSelfAssignmentInfo: [W]You can use this self assignment page to get access to the details of the digital case and it's contents.
p1: [W]Enter the details below to access the response form for this case.

id.required: [W]Enter an online case reference number that exactly matches the case details
id.invalid: [W]You entered an invalid submission reference. Submission reference should be 16 numeric characters in 123456789123456 or 1234-5678-9123-4567 formats

respondentName.required: [W]Enter respondent name that exactly matches the case details

firstName.required: [W]Enter claimant name that exactly matches the case details

lastName.required: [W]Enter claimant last name that exactly matches the case details

hiddenErrorField.api: [W]Unable to assign role. Please try again later
hiddenErrorField.caseAlreadyAssignedToSameUser: [W]You have already assigned to this case
hiddenErrorField.caseAlreadyAssigned: [W]Case has already assigned to a respondent
hiddenErrorField.sessionRespondent: [W]Unable to find selected respondent in session
hiddenErrorField.userId: [W]Invalid session user. User does not have an ID
hiddenErrorField.invalidCaseDetails: [W]Please enter the details exactly as they are written on the case, including any mistakes
